links: Douglas E. Iannucci and Donna Mills-Taylor, On Generalizing the Connell Sequence, J. Integer Sequences, Vol. 2, 1999, #99.1.7.
formula: a(n) = 5*n - 4*floor((7 + sqrt(24*n - 23))/6). See general formula in A045928. - _Michel Marcus_, Apr 02 2013
example: As a triangle, sequence begins:1;2, 7, 12, 17;18, 23, 28, 33, 38, 43, 48;... - _Michel Marcus_, Apr 02 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
